  • Method Details

    • loadNextScene

      public void loadNextScene​(java.lang.String fxmlUrl, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane container, Player player)
      Method is being called if the next Scene is going to be 1280x720px big. can be called for simply changing a scene.
      Parameters:
      fxmlUrl - FXML file that is being loaded.
      container - is the main gui container element of the scene calling this method.
      player - is the player that is currently playing.

    • loadNextSceneSettings

    • loadPopUp

      public void loadPopUp​(java.lang.String fxmlUrl, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane container, Player player, int width, int height)
      This method loads a Pop-Up window in the current window.
      Parameters:
      fxmlUrl - FXML file that is being loaded.
      width - of the pop-up.
      height - of the pop-up.

    • loadTextPopUp

      public void loadTextPopUp​(java.lang.String itemText, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane container, Player player)
      This method loads a Pop-Up window which prints out the description of a describable item.
      Parameters:
      itemText - Description of describable item, which can be found in Item.json

    • blurBG

      public void blurBG​(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane pane)
      Blur the owner window when the PopUp has been opened.
      Parameters:
      pane - of the owner.

    • unblurBG

      public void unblurBG​(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane pane)
      Unblur the owner window when the PopUp has been closed.
      Parameters:
      pane - of the owner.
